::Killfest/EndBringer/Demise/Greven/Darkmouse/Goldeneye::

Killfest listens to the voice that announced Optimus Prime's return, 
showing no surprise or any other emotion. It didn't matter to him. 
Optimus Prime could arise if he wanted.

He looked at Motormaster, waiting for the bot to speak.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer, Demise, and Greven also hearing the voice. EndBringer 
smiles. This meant that there was another bot out there to kill!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Darkmouse nearly jumps up as she hears the voice. "What the?!" She 
looks down at DrillBit and Dollen. "Did you guys hear that??"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Walking through the corridor's of Darkfate's base, Goldeneye spins 
around at the voice, looking at the hallways with a surprised 
expression.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Dark Prime-->Optimus Prime::
> 
>     He had been wandering for days, not caring if he returned to 
Nod. Suddenly he got a feeling that something wasn't right in the 
Universe. There were too many evils, and and age old riverly could 
not be brought to a close.
>     Galvatron was alive. Optimus Prime was stuck within the 
Evilness of Dark Prime. They would not be able to fight both being 
evil. Primus needed to be sated.
>     The Time Gateway (remember that?) Glowed with a firey reddness. 
The source of Prime's evil and his lust for the power of Cronus was 
seated there. The Gateway exploded, shattering into thousands of 
peices.
>     Dark Prime fell to his knees. His body was wracked with pain. 
His chest panel opened of it's own will (well, not really) and the 
Autobot Matrix emerged. It floated out from Prime's chest and then it 
opened. Releasing all of Prime's goodness back into him, but leaving 
just enough evil to get the job done. Prime's body went through a 
change as well, from his knees to his feet became Blue, his upper 
legs became white, his arms and chest became the familiar Prime Red. 
His mouth plate became silver, along with much of his face, the 
helmet that surrounded it bacame blue, his hands also became Blue.
>     As the Matrix went back into his chest a giant light emitted 
from him, it covered the entire planet (got permission) everything on 
the planet saw this light.
>     A voice boomed over the planet, all bots could hear this as 
well, no matter where they were. The voice said, "Arise, Optimus 
Prime."
>     Dark Prime had died, Optimus Prime was reborn, with a new drive.
> 
> (Please add Dark Prime to the Matrix)
